# Rank Images

Place rank images in this directory with the following naming convention:

- `novice.png` (or `.jpg`)
- `apprentice.png`
- `warrior.png`
- `champion.png`
- `master.png`
- `grandmaster.png`
- `legend.png`
- `mythic.png`

The images should be square format (recommended: 64x64 or 128x128 pixels) and will be displayed in the user profile.

Supported formats: PNG, JPEG, WebP
